title: Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 39 of 2022), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 

(Commencement) Order 2022.

title: Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 39 of 2022), hereby order as
heading: 3. The 16th day of December 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. The 16th day of December 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 

following provisions of the Act of 2022 shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1 (other than section 4); 

(b) 

sections 5, 6 and 9(a); 

(c) 

section 27.

text_raw:
5. The 28th day of April 2023 is appointed as the day on which the

title: Water Services (Amendment) Act 2022 (No. 39 of 2022), hereby order as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 1(3) of the Water Services (Amendment) 
Act 2022 (No. 39 of 2022), this Order appoints different dates on which 
specified provisions of that Act come into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [678] 5
